name: opencut
tagline: A project planning tool for managing workshop cut lists
description: OpenCut is a self-hosted project planner and scheduling tool focused on makers or fabricators. It provides cut lists, material usage, and order management for workshop environments.

features.title: Cut List Generation
features.description: Create optimized cutting plans from project dimensions to minimize material waste and costs

features.title: Material Tracking
features.description: Monitor inventory levels for wood, metal, and other materials with usage history and reorder alerts

features.title: Project Scheduling
features.description: Plan fabrication timelines with task dependencies and resource allocation for workshop efficiency

features.title: Order Management
features.description: Track customer orders from quote to completion with status updates and delivery scheduling

features.title: Waste Optimization
features.description: Calculate best cutting patterns to reduce scrap and maximize yield from stock materials

features.title: Equipment Planning
features.description: Assign tools and machines to tasks based on availability and project requirements

features.title: Cost Estimation
features.description: Generate accurate quotes by calculating material costs, labor hours, and overhead for each project

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Output cut lists and plans to PDF or CSV for shop floor use and integration
